title: מפתחים, יש לנו 8 משרות חמות וחדשות עבורכם
description: ריכזנו עבורכם 8 משרות בחברות שגדלות ומגייסות עובדים, ולכולן יש עמוד ב-Geektime Insider כדי שתוכלו לקבל הצצה לעבודה היומיומית בהן
articleBody:
ריכזנו עבורכם 8 משרות בחברות שגדלות ומגייסות עובדים, ולכולן יש עמוד ב-Geektime Insider כדי שתוכלו לקבל הצצה לעבודה היומיומית בהן
מקור: Pixabay
לעובדים בתעשיית הסטארטאפים וההייטק יש דרישות מיוחדות ממקום העבודה שלהם. מעבר למשכורת מתגמלת, כולנו רוצים גם מקום עבודה שייתן משמעות וערך נוספים, אבל גם יאפשר לאזן בין עבודה לפנאי, ושסביבת העבודה תהיה מפרה ומעוררת השראה ושתעודד צמיחה, למידה ומקצועיות. איך מוצאים מקום כזה? בדיוק בשביל זה אנחנו כאן.
Geektime Insider נולד כדי לתת לקהילת ההייטק והסטארטאפים את מה שהיה חסר לה: המידע החשוב ביותר על החברות הפועלות בשוק ועל העבודה בהן. תוכלו למצוא בו מגוון פלטפורמות תוכן, שיחד חושפות את “מאחורי הקלעים” של החברות המגייסות. אחרי שתקבלו את התמונה המלאה, תוכלו להחליט אם מדובר במקום שבו תרצו לעבוד.

For our growing team, we are looking for a talented developer. The ideal candidate is a true team player with a passion for cutting-edge technologies, who will join us in creating both existing and new products.
Responsibilities:
 include helping design, build and scale our data infrastructure and use the best tools the open source world has to offer, in order to drive our business stakeholders to achieve the best data driven solutions possible.

To send a CV for the position of Data Engineer – Yotpo

To send a CV for the position of Test Automation Team Leader – Yotpo

Trax is looking for a Senior Data Scientist to join its thriving R&D team. This person will be joining our advanced data science group and become a key participant in driving research, designing, developing and delivering our novel platform for the world of retail based on our unique data set.
The ideal candidate will be an independent and reliable team player with strong background in quantitative methods and broad understanding of data driven algorithms. He or she is expected to be a self learner that can drive projects from their research state all the way through their productization.
Responsibilities:
– Become a key player in our team of Data Scientists, mentoring and providing both theoretical and technical support.
– Use cutting edge machine learning algorithms, statistics and business intelligence to drive valuable insights to our customers.
– Applying creativity and innovation to come up with new applications and use cases from our current and future data.
– Take an active role in the realization of projects. Drive projects from research and ideation all the way to application integration in our core technology offering.
– Evangelize data driven approach in Trax. Collaborate with both development and product teams to drive superior results in a timely manner.
– Build strong interfaces with the entire R&D team to understand architecture, application development and analytics requirements
Requirements:
– A motivated self leaner with a “can do” attitude
– Hands on experience in applying statistics, machine learning and AI techniques on real world data, with broad knowledge in various quantative methods (Data mining, Information Retrieval, Supervised / Unsupervised / Reinforced / Statistical Learning, Bayesian methods, Graphical models, etc)
– Good knowledge in Python / R / Scala / Julia and the ability to build systems and environments from scratch
– Working experience with large data sets.
– Experienced in using Big Data tools (Spark, MapReduce, Hive, Pig, etc) – a plus
– Working experience with either SQL based RDBMS or NoSQL – a plus
– Working Experience in Cloud based environments is – a plus
– M.Sc./P.hD. with strong quantitative skills
To send a CV for the position of Senior Data Scientist – Trax

The Zebra data team owns the data across the company – from acquiring, cleaning, archiving, indexing, serving and building tools to analyze the data – both for humans and for algorithms.
We use Python, Redis, ElasticSearch, Mongo DB and node.js, as well as docker and Rancher as our tools of trade.
We are looking for a Senior Data engineer to join our team and help us take our infrastructure to the next level.
Responsibilities:
– Develop, maintain and operate complex data pipelines
– Build tools to monitor and alert on data quality and availability
– Design and develop tools and automations that expose the data to the rest of the company – from researches to the scalable automatic process which train machine learning models.
Requirements:
– 4+ years experience in backend development on distributed, scalable system – preferably in Python.
– 2+ years experience in Linux.
– 2+ year experience in data engineering – data pipeline design, implementation, operations
– 1+ Experience working with no SQL databases – at least one of cassandra/hbase/Elastic/Mongo​/Couchbase/Redis
– Python expert – very strong advantage
– Machine learning background/understanding – very strong advantage
– Hadoop/spark – strong advantage
– Docker – strong advantage
– Monitoring systems, alerting etc. – advantage
– Node.js – advantage
To send a CV for the position of Senior Data engineer – Zebra 

Responsibilities:

To send a CV for the position of Algorithms group leader – Zebra 

We are building a state of the art security platform for large enterprises in the exciting and innovative new field of software containers. Our systems are deployed on thousands of customer servers around the world. A distributed system to watch over distributed systems!
We are looking for an experienced Windows internals engineer to join our core team, in charge of developing security solutions for the new Windows and Hyper-V containers!
In this role, you will take part in development and design of new security features for containers running on Windows. You will be expected to find innovative solutions for security challenges that seems unsolvable. You will use your experience to dive into the Windows Kernel, develop drivers and integrate them with user space services. All done in a super efficient way.
Requirements:
– BS in Computer Science or equivalent
– 4+ years of relevant professional experience
– Expert knowledge in C/C++ Windows development at Kernel and user levels
– Deep understanding of Windows OS internals
– Proficient in debugging techniques with any of WinDbg, OllyDbg, IDA Pro Virtualization technologies Software (SDLC) and product development lifecycles (PLC)
– Security background – big advantage
– Experience with Hyper-V/Virtualization
– Strong communication skills, both verbal and written
To send a CV for the position of Windows Internals Engineer – Aqua Security
